groupHeaders: On a scale of 1 - 10, if 1 represents the least mobile and functional, and 10 represents the most mobile and functional:
instructions: Ask the patient to rate his/her mobility when using the orthotic intervention on a 1 to 10 scale where 1 represents the least mobile and 10 represents the most mobile.
overview: The Orthotic Mobility Score is a self-reporting tool that uses a 10-point numerical rating scale for assessment of orthotic function and mobility.
population: The intended population includes the following condition: Orthosis Users.
score_calculation: The score is reported as the whole number response.
